00027 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00028 /// CPuzzleGraphView::CPuzzleGraphView
00029 ///
00030 /// @description    This is the constructor of the CPuzzleGraphView class which
00031 ///                 is responsible for allowing users to interact with the graph
00032 ///                 portion of a puzzle.
00033 /// @pre            None
00034 /// @post           Member variables have been initialized.
00035 ///
00036 /// @param parent:  This is a pointer to the parent QObject.
00037 ///
00038 /// @limitations    None
00039 ///
00040 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00041 CPuzzleGraphView::CPuzzleGraphView( QWidget *parent )
00042 : QScrollArea( parent )
00043 {
00044     setupCanvas();
00045     setWidget( m_canvas );
00046     m_canvas->setMouseTracking( true );
00047 
00048     m_model = new CPuzzleGraphModel( this );
00049 
00050     m_nodeArtist = new CPuzzleNodeArtist( m_canvas );
00051     m_nodeArtist->setModel( m_model );
00052 
00053     m_spanArtist = new CPuzzleSpanArtist( m_canvas );
00054     m_spanArtist->setModel( m_model );
00055 
00056     m_nodeCreator = new CPuzzleNodeCreator( m_canvas );
00057     m_nodeCreator->setModel( m_model );
00058 
00059     m_spanCreator = new CPuzzleSpanCreator( m_canvas );
00060     m_spanCreator->setModel( m_model );
00061 
00062     m_nodeMover = new CPuzzleNodeMover( m_canvas );
00063     m_nodeMover->setModel( m_model );
00064 
00065     m_nodeEditor = new CPuzzleNodeEditor( m_canvas );
00066     m_nodeEditor->setModel( m_model );
00067     m_nodeEditor->setSpanCreator( m_spanCreator );
00068 
00069     m_spanEditor = new CPuzzleSpanEditor( m_canvas );
00070     m_spanEditor->setModel( m_model );
00071 
00072     connect( m_model, SIGNAL(changed()), this, SLOT(modelChanged()) );
00073     connect( m_nodeMover, SIGNAL(done()), this, SLOT(moveDone()) );
00074 }
00075 
00076 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00077 /// CPuzzleGraphView::~CPuzzleGraphView
00078 ///
00079 /// @description  This is the destructor for the CPuzzleGraphView class which
00080 ///               frees up dynamically allocated memory.
00081 /// @pre          None
00082 /// @post         None
00083 ///
00084 /// @limitations  None
00085 ///
00086 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00087 CPuzzleGraphView::~CPuzzleGraphView()
00088 {
00089     if ( m_nodeArtist )
00090         delete m_nodeArtist;
00091 }
00092 
00093 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00094 /// CPuzzleGraphView::eventFilter
00095 ///
00096 /// @description   This function filters events so they get passed on to the
00097 ///                appropriate child object.
00098 /// @pre           None
00099 /// @post          None
00100 ///
00101 /// @param o:      This is a pointer to the QObject where the event was
00102 ///                triggered from.
00103 /// @param e:      This is a pointer to the QEvent that was triggered.
00104 ///
00105 /// @return bool:  Returns true if the event was used and false otherwise.
00106 ///
00107 /// @limitations   None
00108 ///
00109 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00110 bool CPuzzleGraphView::eventFilter( QObject *o, QEvent *e )
00111 {
00112     bool bReturn;
00113     if( o == m_canvas )
00114     {
00115         switch( e->type() )
00116         {
00117         case QEvent::Paint:
00118             m_spanArtist->paintModel();
00119             m_spanCreator->paint();
00120             m_nodeArtist->paintModel();
00121             return true;
00122   case QEvent::MouseButtonPress:
00123   case QEvent::MouseButtonRelease:
00124   case QEvent::MouseMove:
00125             bReturn = m_spanCreator->canvasMouseEvent(
00126                           static_cast<QMouseEvent *>(e) );
00127             if ( !bReturn )
00128                 bReturn = m_nodeMover->canvasMouseEvent(
00129                               static_cast<QMouseEvent *>(e) );
00130             return bReturn;
00131         case QEvent::ContextMenu:
00132   case QEvent::MouseButtonDblClick:
00133             bReturn = m_nodeEditor->canvasContextEvent(
00134                           static_cast<QContextMenuEvent *>(e) );
00135             if ( !bReturn )
00136                 bReturn = m_spanEditor->canvasContextEvent(
00137                               static_cast<QContextMenuEvent *>(e) );
00138             if ( !bReturn )
00139                 bReturn = m_nodeCreator->canvasContextEvent(
00140                               static_cast<QContextMenuEvent *>(e) );
00141             return bReturn;
00142         default:
00143             break;
00144         }
00145 
00146     }
00147 
00148     return QScrollArea::eventFilter(o,e);
00149 }

00160 /// @limitations                None

00162 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00163 CPuzzleGraphModel * CPuzzleGraphView::getModel()

00169 /// CPuzzleGraphView::loadFromFile

00171 /// @description      This function loads the given file into the program.

00173 /// @post             The given file is loaded.

00175 /// @param fileName:  This is the path and file name of the file to be loaded.

00177 /// @limitations      None

00179 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

00185 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00186 /// CPuzzleGraphView::modelChanged
00187 ///
00188 /// @description  This function is used as a slot to indicated the model
00189 ///               changed and the graph need to be repainted.
00190 /// @pre          None
00191 /// @post         None
00192 ///
00193 /// @limitations  None
00194 ///
00195 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00196 void CPuzzleGraphView::modelChanged()
00197 {
00198     m_canvas->update();
00199 }
00200 
00201 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00202 /// CPuzzleGraphView::moveDone
00203 ///
00204 /// @description  This function is used as a slot to indicate a node is done
00205 ///               being moved.  It makes sure that the graph is fully shown on
00206 ///               the screen.
00207 /// @pre          None
00208 /// @post         None
00209 ///
00210 /// @limitations  None
00211 ///
00212 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00213 void CPuzzleGraphView::moveDone()
00214 {
00215     m_model->realignData();
00216     updateCanvasSize();
00217 }
00218 
00219 
00220 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00221 /// CPuzzleGraphView::toggleHeuristics
00222 ///
00223 /// @description  This function is used as a slot to tell the node artist to
00224 ///               display or not display node heuristic values
00225 /// @pre          None
00226 /// @post         None
00227 ///
00228 /// @limitations  None
00229 ///
00230 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00231 void CPuzzleGraphView::toggleHeuristics(bool b)
00232 {
00233  if(!m_nodeArtist)
00234   return;
00235  m_nodeArtist->toggleHeuristics(b);
00236  m_canvas->update();
00237 }

00239 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00240 /// CPuzzleGraphView::resizeEvent
00241 ///
00242 /// @description  This function handles resizing the window.
00243 /// @pre          None
00244 /// @post         None
00245 ///
00246 /// @param e:     This is a pointer to the resize event.
00247 ///
00248 /// @limitations  None
00249 ///
00250 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00251 void CPuzzleGraphView::resizeEvent( QResizeEvent *e )
00252 {
00253     updateCanvasSize();
00254     QScrollArea::resizeEvent( e ); // Performs the rest of the logic for a
00255                                    // resize such as updating scroll bars
00256 }

00264 ///

00267 /// @limitations      None
00268 ///
00269 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00270 void CPuzzleGraphView::saveToFile( const QString &fileName )
00271 {

00273 }

00275 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00276 /// CPuzzleGraphView::setupCanvas
00277 ///
00278 /// @description  This function creates the canvas and prepares it to be drawn
00279 ///               on.
00280 /// @pre          None
00281 /// @post         The canvas is ready to be drawn to.
00282 ///
00283 /// @limitations  None
00284 ///
00285 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00286 void CPuzzleGraphView::setupCanvas()
00287 {
00288     m_canvas = new QWidget;
00289 
00290     QPalette pal(m_canvas->palette());
00291     pal.setColor( QPalette::Active, QPalette::Background, Qt::white );
00292     m_canvas->setPalette(pal);
00293 }
00294 
00295 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00296 /// CPuzzleGraphView::updateCanvasSize
00297 ///
00298 /// @description  This function resizes the canvas if a node is dragged off the
00299 ///               canvas screen so that scroll bars appear and the node can
00300 ///               be viewed still.
00301 /// @pre          None
00302 /// @post         The canvas is resized to the smallest size which fits the
00303 ///               window and allows all nodes to still be seen.
00304 ///
00305 /// @limitations  None
00306 ///
00307 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00308 void CPuzzleGraphView::updateCanvasSize()
00309 {
00310     QRect minCanvasRect( m_model->getContainingRect() );
00311     minCanvasRect.setTopLeft( QPoint(0,0) );
00312 
00313     m_canvas->resize( minCanvasRect.size().expandedTo( viewport()->size() ) );
00314 }
